tweet.text: In summer 1984 discussions, Sec. Shultz, Soviet Foreign Minister Gromyko, and Soviet Amb. Dobrynin failed to agree on new arms control talks; but would the U.S. agree to the Soviets’ umbrella talks proposal? Find out in #FRUS: —https://t.co/TSBz4iuIvV —https://t.co/q2qLMUOcHK https://t.co/8kpxkg5nC4
